languages.text: "Некоторые, как и Муаран, уверяют — виной всему племя {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g}. Однако истина мне до сих пор неведома. Но я надеюсь — о, надеюсь и молю богов, — что однажды она мне откроется!"

traits.locale_text: "Некоторые, как и Муаран, уверяют — виной всему племя {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g}. Однако истина мне до сих пор неведома. Но я надеюсь — о, надеюсь и молю богов, — что однажды она мне откроется!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Some, like Muaran, lay the blame entirely on {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}. However, I do not know the truth. But I hope — oh, I desperately hope and pray to the gods — that someday it will be revealed to me!"
languages.original_text: "Некоторые, как и Муаран, уверяют — виной всему племя {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g}. Однако истина мне до сих пор неведома. Но я надеюсь — о, надеюсь и молю богов, — что однажды она мне откроется!"

traits.locale_text: "Some, like Muaran, are laying the blame entirely on mon-keigh. But I do not know the truth and hope — o, I desperately hope and pray to the gods — that some day it will be revealed to me!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Some, like Muaran, are laying the blame entirely on mon-keigh. But I do not know the truth and hope — o, I desperately hope and pray to the gods — that some day it will be revealed to me!"

traits.locale_text: "Some, like Muaran, lay the blame entirely on {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}. However, I do not know the truth. But I hope — oh, I desperately hope and pray to the gods — that someday it will be revealed to me!"

traits.locale_text: "Some, like Muaran, lay the blame entirely on {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}. However, I do not know the truth. But I hope — oh, I desperately hope and pray to the gods — that someday it will be revealed to me!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Some, like Muaran, lay the blame entirely on {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}. However, I do not know the truth. But I hope — oh, I desperately hope and pray to the gods — that someday it will be revealed to me!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “一部分族人，比如穆兰，会把所有责任都归咎于{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}猴子{/g}。虽然我还没找到真相，但我期望有朝一日，真相在我眼前揭晓。噢，我是如此渴望知道真相，我向众神祈祷！”
languages.original_text: "Some, like Muaran, lay the blame entirely on {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}. However, I do not know the truth. But I hope — oh, I desperately hope and pray to the gods — that someday it will be revealed to me!"

traits.locale_text: “一部分族人，比如穆兰，会把所有责任都归咎于{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}猴子{/g}。虽然我还没找到真相，但我期望有朝一日，真相在我眼前揭晓。噢，我是如此渴望知道真相，我向众神祈祷！”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "Some, like Muaran, lay the blame entirely on mon-keigh. However, I do not know the truth. But I hope — oh, I desperately hope and pray to the gods — that someday it will be revealed to me!"

languages.text: «Algunos, como Muaran, culpan exclusivamente a los {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}. Yo desconozco la verdad, pero espero desesperadamente, y rezo por ello, que algún día me sea revelada».
languages.original_text: "Some, like Muaran, lay the blame entirely on {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}. However, I do not know the truth. But I hope — oh, I desperately hope and pray to the gods — that someday it will be revealed to me!"

traits.locale_text: «Algunos, como Muaran, culpan exclusivamente a los {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}. Yo desconozco la verdad, pero espero desesperadamente, y rezo por ello, que algún día me sea revelada».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「ムアランのように、{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}モン＝ケイ{/g}にすべての責を負わせる者もいる。しかし、我は真実を知らない。だが、願わくば…いつかそれが明らかにされることを、神々へと切に願い、祈っているのだ！」
languages.original_text: "Some, like Muaran, lay the blame entirely on {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}. However, I do not know the truth. But I hope — oh, I desperately hope and pray to the gods — that someday it will be revealed to me!"

traits.locale_text: 「ムアランのように、{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}モン＝ケイ{/g}にすべての責を負わせる者もいる。しかし、我は真実を知らない。だが、願わくば…いつかそれが明らかにされることを、神々へと切に願い、祈っているのだ！」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Manche, wie Muaran sehen die Schuld ganz allein bei den {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Chem-Pan-Sey{/g}. Doch ich kenne die Wahrheit nicht. Ich hoffe jedoch, dass sie mir eines Tages offenbart wird. Oh, wie ich es hoffe, ich bete zu den Göttern darum!"
languages.original_text: "Some, like Muaran, lay the blame entirely on {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}. However, I do not know the truth. But I hope — oh, I desperately hope and pray to the gods — that someday it will be revealed to me!"

traits.locale_text: "Manche, wie Muaran sehen die Schuld ganz allein bei den {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Chem-Pan-Sey{/g}. Doch ich kenne die Wahrheit nicht. Ich hoffe jedoch, dass sie mir eines Tages offenbart wird. Oh, wie ich es hoffe, ich bete zu den Göttern darum!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Certains, comme Muaran, ont entièrement rejeté la faute sur les {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}. Je ne connais pas la vérité, mais j'espère... oh, j'espère de tout mon cœur et je prie les dieux pour qu'elle me soit révélée un jour ! »
languages.original_text: "Some, like Muaran, lay the blame entirely on {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}. However, I do not know the truth. But I hope — oh, I desperately hope and pray to the gods — that someday it will be revealed to me!"

traits.locale_text: « Certains, comme Muaran, ont entièrement rejeté la faute sur les {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}. Je ne connais pas la vérité, mais j'espère... oh, j'espère de tout mon cœur et je prie les dieux pour qu'elle me soit révélée un jour ! »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Muaran gibi bazıları, tüm bunlardan {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keighleri{/g} sorumlu tutuyor. Ben hakikati bilmiyorum. Yine de umutluyum... Deliler gibi hem de. Hakikat bir gün bana yüzünü göstersin diye tanrılara dualar ediyorum!"
languages.original_text: "Some, like Muaran, lay the blame entirely on {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}. However, I do not know the truth. But I hope — oh, I desperately hope and pray to the gods — that someday it will be revealed to me!"

traits.locale_text: "Muaran gibi bazıları, tüm bunlardan {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}leri sorumlu tutuyor. Ancak ben hakikati bilmiyorum. Yine de umutluyum... Deliler gibi umutluyum. Tanrılara dualar ediyorum ki hakikat bir gün bana yüzünü göstersin!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
